transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Pretzel
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>35%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. (Applied 2 times)
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000015_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000015_1_1] turn(s)</color>. (Applied 2 times)

SKT_SECOND.name: Pilgrimage
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Performs an <color=#28d9ed>additional attack</color> if the target is successfully inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Activates an additional attack\nIncreases Priority by 50%

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Recovering Priority changes to gaining an extra turn

description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000015_2_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000015_2_1] turn(s)</color>. Performs an <color=#28d9ed>additional attack</color> if the target is successfully inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Nine Inch Nails
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: When using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to <color=#28d9ed>remove all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> from a target, then attacks that target.\nThe damage is increased if the target has been inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.
description: When using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000015_3_1]</color> chance to <color=#28d9ed>remove all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> from a target, then attacks that target.\nThe damage is increased if the target has been inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>2</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> 2 times on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000015_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000015_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> 2 times on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000015_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
